body:
If I were, not president, but if I were king in America, I would abolish all teachers’ lounges where they sit together and worry how woe is us.”

— Gov. John Kasich of Ohio, a Republican presidential candidate, discussing fear-mongering done by teachers’ unions at an education forum in New Hampshire.
description: “If I were, not president, but if I were king in America, I would abolish all teachers’ lounges where they sit together and worry how woe is us.” — John Kasich, at an education forum in New Hampshire.
title: First Draft: Verbatim: John Kasich Takes On Teachers’ Attitudes
